com.facebook.litho.widget

Class Spinner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.ComponentLifecycle
      • com.facebook.litho.Component
        • com.facebook.litho.widget.Spinner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Equivalence<Component>, EventDispatcher, EventTriggerTarget, HasEventDispatcher, HasEventTrigger, java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class Spinner
extends Component
    A simple spinner (dropdown) component. Derived from the standard Android android.widget.Spinner

    Additionally added logic to flip the caret vertically once menu is shown.

    If no optional values are provided the component will look like it's material design counterpart.

    See Also:
    com.facebook.litho.widget.SpinnerSpec

    • Required Props

        • selectedOption

          initially selected option for the spinner
          Type:
          The

        • options

          options available from the dropdown

          Type:
          The
